objective: Infiltrate the high-roller casino, navigate its labyrinthine security, and extract the legendary 'Midnight Star' diamond from its impenetrable vault before dawn.

locations.name: Neon Alley Rooftop
locations.description: The humid night air buzzes with the distant hum of city life and the flickering glow of a hundred neon signs reflecting in grimy puddles below.
locations.visual: Gritty rooftop, rain-slicked vents, distant city skyline, flickering neon casino signs.

locations.name: Crawlspace Labyrinth
locations.description: A claustrophobic maze of dust-coated metal ducts and exposed wiring, echoing with the faint whir of the casino's massive AC units.
locations.visual: Tight, dark ventilation shaft, wires, metal grates, dust motes in a beam of light.

locations.name: Velvet Rope Lounge
locations.description: Opulent, deserted private game lounge, still reeking faintly of stale cigars and desperation, with plush, overturned chairs and discarded champagne flutes.
locations.visual: Luxurious, empty private casino lounge, velvet ropes, overturned chairs, discarded champagne glasses.

locations.name: Hawk-Eye Hallway
locations.description: A sterile, brightly lit corridor lined with an intimidating array of constantly panning security cameras and pressure plates embedded in the polished floor.
locations.visual: Long, sterile corridor, multiple security cameras on walls, floor pressure plates, bright fluorescent lights.

locations.name: Prestige Vault Antechamber
locations.description: A heavily fortified antechamber, sparse but imposing, with a reinforced steel door dominating one wall and biometric scanners glinting ominously.
locations.visual: Cold, stark antechamber, massive steel vault door, biometric scanners, low-level emergency lighting.

locations.name: Heart of Gold Vault
locations.description: Shelves piled high with stacks of crisp cash, glittering rows of rare chips, and an overwhelming aura of concentrated wealth guarded by a single, priceless artifact.
locations.visual: Vault interior, stacks of cash, rare casino chips, dazzling jewels, single glowing artifact in center.

items.name: Grappling Hook Launcher
items.description: Compact device for rapid vertical ascent.
items.visual: Sleek, black, pistol-grip device with a coiled rope and a clawed hook attached, ready to fire.

items.name: Thermal Goggles
items.description: See heat signatures through smoke or darkness.
items.visual: Dark, tactical goggles with a glowing red and orange thermal overlay display, ready to be worn.

items.name: Network Tap
items.description: Discreet device to intercept network data.
items.visual: Small, flat, black box with multiple RJ45 ports and blinking green activity lights.

items.name: RFID Skimmer
items.description: Wirelessly copies card data from pockets.
items.visual: Slim, credit card-sized device with a small, barely visible antenna, held subtly in a hand.

items.name: VIP Guest List
items.description: Names and room numbers of high-rollers.
items.visual: Leather-bound notebook with elegant script, open to a page showing multiple names and numbers.

items.name: Security Override Dongle
items.visual: USB-like device with a blinking red light, attached to a short, flexible cable.

items.name: Nano-Fiber Lockpicks
items.visual: Set of extremely fine, metallic lockpicks, glinting under ambient light, held delicately.

items.name: Stealth Smoke Pellets
items.visual: Small, dark, cylindrical pellets arranged neatly in a tactical pouch, ready for deployment.

items.name: Biometric Scanner Bypass
items.description: Emulates a valid fingerprint or retina scan.
items.visual: Small, clear gel pad with intricate circuit patterns, next to a miniature screen displaying a fingerprint image.

items.name: Sonic Drill Bit
items.description: Pierces reinforced steel with minimal noise.
items.visual: Specialized drill bit with a unique spiral pattern and a dull, non-reflective finish, designed for silence.

items.name: The Golden Scarab
items.description: Ancient artifact, solid gold, encrusted with rubies.
items.visual: Intricately carved golden scarab beetle, shimmering with embedded red rubies, resting on a plush velvet cushion inside a display case.

cover_options.npc_reaction: Suspicious but may help if convinced
May believe or may see through it
Suspicious but may help if convinced
May believe or may see through it

tasks.description: Locate hidden security override in hallway.
Find vital equipment on the rooftop.
Distract IT specialist for network access.
Bypass biometric scanner at vault door.
Extract VIP list from lounge manager.
